ing.item: White cake mix; OR Yellow cake mix

directions.step:
* Pour into cup slowly to retain bubbles, but not have a lot of foam on top.
Put all ingredients into mixing bowl and beat two to three minutes at medium speed. Pour batter into greased and floured tube pan. Bake at 350 degrees 45 to 60 minutes until cakes tests done and barely begins to pull away from sides of pan. Glaze with lemon glaze while warm. source: from a family friend
Posted to TNT - Prodigy's Recipe Exchange Newsletter by SBTY18D@prodigy.com (MS ANNE WEBB) on 3 Ju, l 1997
